heisigComment: * As a primitive, use the image of a saint's halo. As with silver, when this element is drawn on the left, the penultimate stroke is omitted.
koohiiStory1: With a drop of silver, the forces of good can vanquish the werewolves.
koohiiStory2: A drop of silver is good, but a whole bar of it is better!
words:
良い(いい): good
改良(かいりょう): improvement, reform
善良(ぜんりょう): goodness, excellence, virtue
不良(ふりょう): badness, delinquent, inferiority, failure
良好(りょうこう): favorable, satisfactory
良識(りょうしき): good sense
良質(りょうしつ): good quality, superior quality
良心(りょうしん): conscience
仲良し(なかよし): intimate friend, close friend
